oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Huff, Jack. RPPC Little Pigeon River
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jack Huff
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Little Pigeon River. Smoky Mountains National Park. 208 Jack Huff. 1 pc .RPPC (Real photo postcard). Postmarked July 22, 1936, Sevierville, Gatlinburg. Note from Dorothy to Miss Myrtle Schrieber, Chicago, IL. One cent stamp.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Great Smoky Mountains; Postcards; Rivers; Rocks;
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Postcard Collection, filed under Great Smoky Mtns.- Little River.
